headline: Trump Holds Huge Rally In Delaware, Ohio (VIDEO)
author: Mike LaChance
sentences:
Just the News reports:
Trump blisters Biden at Ohio rally: ‘Taking orders from the Easter Bunny’
Former President Donald Trump on Saturday night launched a blistering attack against his successor, ridiculing Joe Biden as a “bewildered” president who is “taking orders from the Easter Bunny” and allowing radical leftists, unchecked crime, soaring inflation and an open border destroy America.

Politico reports:
Trump lays down marker for Vance in Ohio rally: ‘This man is going to win’
Trending: Steve Hilton: The Idea Of A Second Term For Joe Biden Is Absurd And Offensive (VIDEO)

“Just look at the un-select committee of political hacks and what they’re doing to our country while radical-left murderers, rapists, and insurrectionists roam free: Nothing happens to them.”

“He’s a guy who said some bad shit about me,” Trump said to laughs from the crowd.
And this man is going to win,” Trump said as he introduced Vance to the stage at the Delaware County Fairgrounds, just 10 days before the May 3 election.
